thread.title: Charles Rube

author: Charles Rube
title: Charles Rube
text: We were a little distressed that we've been paying a good amount of money monthly for ZipRecruiter when we haven't been using it. Les explained carefully and patiently our options, specifically about cancelling auto-renew, and also the option about putting the account in Hiring Pause mode. I think that's a very helpful option as alternative to cancelling the service when we stop needing to post for a job. My only suggestion would be to make it easier for the end user to put the account in Pause mode, perhaps combining a with the auto renew cancel option.
